Sanskriti School Continues to fight against Corona: Posters Activity Middle School
Sanskriti School Continues to fight against Corona: Posters Activity Senior School.

As per the DoE circular dated 21.04.2021(attached herein), the school will be closed for summer vacation for the academic session 2021-22. Junior school will be having summer vacations from tomorrow.
We will  however, be working on Thursday and Friday for Middle and Senior school i.e., 22nd and 23rd April to wrap things and wind up before the vacations.
Kindly note:
There will be a summer camp for students of grade 3-8  which will be optional. 
Extra classes will be held for students in the senior school and remedial /parallel support  classes for the junior and middle school. Details of which  will be posted on the Google classroom
The date for commencement of classes for grade 11 will be announced later.
The holiday homework, the dates and  details for all the aforementioned activities will be announced in the Google Classrooms.

COVID-JANANDOLAN
Orientation for Classes 3 4 5
ATL Community Day

In view of the circular received from CBSE taking into account the safety and well- being of the students, it has been decided that :
The Board Exams for Class XII to be held from May 4th to June 14th 2021 are hereby postponed. The situation will be reviewed on June 1st 2021 by the board and the details will be shared subsequently.
The Board Exams for Class X to be held from May 4th to June 14th 2021 are hereby cancelled.
The details on the assessment plans and the objective criterion on the basis of which Class X results will be prepared will be shared with you shortly once we receive this update.
We will start the classes for Class XI shortly. Kindly check the website for regular updates regarding the same.
